thread.section_title: Caravansinthesun Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Caravansinthesun | www.caravansinthesun.com
thread.title: Christine Bose

author: Christine Bose
title: Christine Bose
text: Well what can I say about this company simply the best me and my daughter went to malaga on the 10/1/17 for 4 days caravans in the sun sent a taxi to the airport to pick us up no bother then the next day at our hotel they sent vivia I think that's how you spell her name to pick us up and take us to the caravan viewing trip she was lovely I have to say there was no pressure to buy I asked loads of questions she was brilliant the site is in torre del mar Spain what a lovely site I am well pleased and I have spoke to James a lot of times and even although I haven't met him he is lovely I will say again they DO NOT PRESSURE you to buy it is up to you yourself fantastic company me and my husband are retiring there in 5 years time and I no we will be happy but for now it will just be a few weeks here and there can't wait to go back thanks again caravans in the sun for being so lovely kind and HONEST from Christine Bose south shields
